Package com.harmonia.backend.controller

Class ServerController

java.lang.Object
com.harmonia.backend.controller.ServerController
@RestController @RequestMapping("server") public class ServerController extends Object
The ServerController class handles HTTP requests related to server management. This class maps incoming requests to the corresponding ServerService methods.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Harmonia team

  • Method Details

    • listServersByServerName

      @GetMapping("serverName/{serverName}") @CrossOrigin public Iterable<Server> listServersByServerName(@PathVariable("serverName") String serverName)
      Returns a list of servers filtered by serverName.
      Parameters:
      serverName - the name of the server to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of servers with matching serverName

    • listServersByServerCategory

      @GetMapping("serverCategory/{serverCategory}") @CrossOrigin public Iterable<Server> listServersByServerCategory(@PathVariable("serverCategory") String serverCategory)
      Returns a list of servers filtered by serverCategory.
      Parameters:
      serverCategory - the category of the server to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of servers with matching serverCategory

    • listServersByOwnerId

      @GetMapping("ownerId/{ownerId}") @CrossOrigin public Iterable<Server> listServersByOwnerId(@PathVariable("ownerId") Long ownerId)
      Returns a list of servers filtered by ownerId.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - the ID of the server owner to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of servers with matching ownerId

    • listServers

      @GetMapping @CrossOrigin public Iterable<Server> listServers()
      Returns a list of all servers.
      Returns:
      a list of all servers

    • addServer

      @PostMapping @CrossOrigin public Server addServer(@RequestBody Server server)
      Adds a new server to the system.
      Parameters:
      server - the server to add
      Returns:
      the newly added server

    • deleteServer

      @DeleteMapping("serverId/{serverId}") @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteServer(@PathVariable("serverId") Long serverId)
      Deletes a server with the given serverId.
      Parameters:
      serverId - the ID of the server to delete
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the success or failure of the operation

    • editServer

      @PutMapping("serverId/{serverId}") @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> editServer(@PathVariable Long serverId, @RequestBody Server server)
      Edits the name and category of the server with the given serverId.
      Parameters:
      serverId - the ID of the server to edit
      server - the new server data to use
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the success or failure of the operation

      @GetMapping("serverId/{serverId}") @CrossOrigin public Server findServerByServerId(@PathVariable("serverId") Long serverId)
